name: 斯特凡·韦德
introduction: Stefan Wade is a British actor, singer & songwriter under the alias of "Ashley David", known in the industry as "The 360 Artist". Stefan has worked behind the scenes as a 360 development artist editing scripts, and is mostly known as "The Treatment Guru" for creating film treatments that have landed films for the likes of Netflix, Amazon, Working Title and many more. The latest was developed for Amazon's first Nigerian film "Gangs of Lagos". Stefan also worked as an assistant, and Co-Producer for John Boyega whilst he played Finn in Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens (2015).Wade has more recently landed a role as one of the Wailers in Reinaldo Marcus Greens latest biopic, Bob Marley: One Love (2024).
